headline: Evergy Schedules Conference Call to Discuss 1st Quarter Results
summary: KANSAS CITY, Mo., April 17, 2025--Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVRG) announced today it will release its 2025 first quarter earnings Thursday, May 8, 2025, before market open. The company plans to host its quarterly conference call and audio webcast to discuss the results Thursday, May 8, 2025.
